pull_requests.title: BIP324: remove unused import from test_sage_decoding.py
pull_requests.body:
drop the unused sys import from bip-0324/test_sage_decoding.py to keep the module dependency list minimal
verified the file with read_lints to ensure no new lint issues are introduced

comment_list.body:
seems OK for a batched update?
